name: The 0$ First Person Shooter
description:
A first person shooter worse than Valorant but probably better than Operation Body Count.

As the title states, it was made with a budget of 0$. Most of the assets were gathered by me, the other were from the internet.

This game took almost a day to make it, if we ignore breaks and resource gathering time.

It's a kusoge, so don't expect anything good from it.

Special thanks:Fabryka Twórców Gier
